Reviews

review by - Yelp

Mary D:

First time, I really wanted avocado roll and it went in from there. From Uber eats delivery was on time and food was hot. The food was really good! The rice was tasty. The calamari was delicious. Tempura shrimp...there wasn't enough! So good. Gyoza- dumplings looked so good and nicely brown. All in all the food was really good and we will be ordering again.

review by - Yelp

Jessica B:

Took my friends visiting town and we had a great experience! Service was fast, and every server was nice and attentive - we agreed they were our best servers since the pandemic began. We got the salmon hibachi dinner, NY strip hibachi dinner, shrimp yaki udon, and the crunchy crab maki roll. One of my friends asked for the miso soup instead of the house soup, but we all liked the house soup better.

review by - Yelp

Nick D:

I go to Wasabi at least twice a week for lunch and their dinner is always fantastic also. I've tried numerous items on the menu and no matter what I get, it's always hot, well cooked, and tastes amazing! Love it here.

review by - Yelp

Annamaria B:

How I've not been here I just don't know. My fiancé and I had some time to grab some dinner before a concert and this seemed like the perfect spot to fill our recent cravings for some sushi. They have an awesome happy hour menu that goes until 7pm. Such a good selection of apps and rolls. We tried three, the California, spicy shrimp and crunchy crab. They were so good...

review by - Yelp

Leisa R:

This is my grandson's and my favorite eatery! We love coming here for sushi and the quiet, peaceful atmosphere. Awesome! Our only wish is that it was open for lunch on Saturday's. But, work our plans around that. Highly recommend Wasabi of Daniel Island.
